description: This file defines Row Level Security (RLS) policies and associated security functions for multiple tables in a database supporting the TurfRun game. It contains policy rules for access control, triggers for field-level validation, and helper functions to enforce security constraints.

methods.name: validate_user_sensitive_fields
methods.description: Ensures that sensitive user fields such as total_ep and respect_level are not decreased during an update.

methods.name: validate_notification_updates
methods.description: Restricts modifications to notification entries, allowing only marking notifications as read.

methods.name: user_owns_zone
methods.description: Checks if a given user owns a specific zone.

methods.name: zone_is_attackable
methods.description: Determines if a zone can be attacked by a user, based on its ownership.

methods.name: is_authenticated
methods.description: Checks if the current user is authenticated.
